transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_001927.3 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000373960.4. The two transcripts differ at the 3'UTR.
